A4.text: The Armistice of Mudros was signed on 30 October 1918

A5.text: The Armistice of Mudros officially brought hostilities to an end between the Allies and the Ottoman Empire

A6.text: The Ottoman Empire's defeat in the war in 1918 was crucial in the eventual dissolution of the empire in 1922.
